channel.title: Devang Grewal - Devang Grewal
channel.description: Essays on AI, programming and life

item.title: Searching for outliers
item.description: most important things are outlier-driven • draw lots of samples • filter for maybe-amazing, not probably-good • learn where your bar should be • expect to fail a lot
item.dc:creator: Devang Grewal

item.title: Staring into the abyss as a core life skill
item.description: thinking about scary things • examples from startups • finding a buddy • getting the timing right • a list of abyss questions
item.dc:creator: Devang Grewal

item.title: How I’ve run major projects
item.description: focus • maintain a detailed plan for victory • run a fast OODA loop • overcommunicate • break off subprojects • have fun • bonus content: my project management starter kit
item.dc:creator: Devang Grewal
